mapper.insert: insert into point_history(ph_po_num, ph_ti_num, ph_detail) values (#{po_num}, #{ti_num}, "사용"), (#{po_num}, #{ti_num}, "적립")
mapper.select: select * from point_history join ticketing on ph_ti_num = ti_num where ph_ti_num = #{ti_num} and ti_state != "예매취소"

select point_history.*, ticketing.ti_save_point, ticketing.ti_use_point, ticketing.ti_state from point_history join ticketing on ph_ti_num = ti_num where ti_me_id = #{me_id} and ti_state != "예매취소" order by ph_num asc
select count(*) from point_history join ticketing on ph_ti_num = ti_num where ti_me_id = #{me_id}
